If you don't want me , don't mess with my feelings .
Never depend on others too much because someday you will have to walk alone.
It’s hard to forget someone who gave you so much to remember.
Its better to just quietly miss someone rather than let them know and just get no response.
There are Billions of people in this world, but sometimes you really need just one.
I never feel alone bcz loneliness is always with me
Sometimes i pretend that i dont care. But really, i care more than anyone else ever will.
No matter how hard you try, Some people will never change.
I’m the type of girl who smiles to make everyone’s day. Even though I’m dying inside.
I hate seeing you because you bring back the feelings I tried so hard to forget.
When You Sit Alone ...You Sit With Your Past ... :(
i am scared of getting too close to anyone because those who said that they will always be there for me.
People who are always Online are the Loneliest ...Agree.?
I dont care who was before me, as long as I know there is nobody during me.
I Hope you will always Remember all the great memories we Created, Because i will.
We may Forget the person but memories stay there forever
Just because we are not close anymore doesn’t mean I dont care about you.
Missing someone is a part of loving them, if you are never apart then you will never know how strong your love really is.
Loneliness is better than a bad company.
“You told me I was perfect, but you still left. I should have known my perfect wouldn’t be good enough.”
Dont cry over someone who wouldnt cry over you.
When she ignores you, thats when you need to talk to her the most.
Sorry isn’t always enough. Sometimes you actually have to change.
Once upon a time, I was stupid enough to fall in love with you.
Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
Every time you ignore me, i regret every text message that i have ever sent you.
Sometimes I hate getting close to people because I think they will just walk out of my life no matter how close we are.
Some days I cant stop thinking about you, and other days I wonder why I am wasting my time.
Some things will never go back to the way they used to be. No matter how much you miss them.
Cheating is a choice not a mistake.
People always cheated me,because I loved them like mad…
I just want an honest relationship. No lies. No mind games. No cheating.
Alphabets in "TEACHING" & "CHEATING" are common.. Those who try 2 'Cheat' u often 'Teach'...
I don't understand why people cheat, if you're not happy, just leave.
if you are in a relationship, flirting is cheating.
People don't cheat by chance, they cheat by choice.
Once a cheater, always a repeater.
Once a cheater always a cheater, they can never be trusted again.
Cheating isnt always kissing, touching, or flirting. If you gotta delete text messages so your partner wont seem them, you are already there.
Cheating is easy. Try something hard, like being committed.
Don't lie, don't cheat, and dont make promises you can't keep.
If you honest and frank,people may cheat you.Be honest and frank anyway.
There is no excuse for cheating in a relationship.
If you are not interested then don't cheat him.. Better leave him
Its not cheating unless you get caught.
If you are in a relationship. Flirting is CHEATING.
Cheaters think everyone cheats. Liars think everyone lies. Keep this in mind.
If you had enough time to cheat, you had enough time to think about it.
Don't cry over someone that won't cry over you.
Cheating is choice , not a mistake .
